lead_paragraph: For its small six-and-a-half-inch circumference, the JBL On Stage Micro III, an iPhone and iPod speaker dock, pumps out a surprising amount of bass.

headline.main: Respectable Bass From a Small Base

abstract: For its small six-and-a-half-inch circumference, the JBL On Stage Micro III, an iPhone and iPod speaker dock, pumps out a surprising amount of bass.
